樔字的基本解释

樔
cháo
泽中守望的高脚窝棚。
古同“巢”，鸟窝；也指没有房屋时人的住处：“尧不诛许由，唐民不皆樔处。”

樔
jiǎo
古通“剿”，灭。

樔
chāo
捕鱼用的小网。

樔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháo］
［《廣韻》鉏交切，平肴，崇。］
鸟窝。亦指远古人类在树上搭成的简陋住处。
[②]［zhāo］
［《集韻》莊交切，平爻，莊。］
通“罺1”。
鱼网。
[③]［jiǎo］
［《洪武正韻》子小切，上篠］
通“勦1”。

樔字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樔； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页550第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?鉏交切，音巢。【說文】澤中守草樓也。亦作巢。【禮·禮運·橧巢註】樔，又作巢。【曹大家·東征賦】諒不登樔而椓蠡兮。【正韻】作轈。　又【類篇】側交切。同罺。橑罟也。【爾雅·釋器】罺謂之汕。【詩·小雅】烝然汕汕。【毛傳】樔也。【李巡云】以薄汕魚也。　又【正韻】子了切，音剿。【漢武帝·悼李夫人賦】命樔絕而不長。　【正字通】巢，當从臼从木。俗从果，非。

樔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
樔字的起名意思

暂无。

樔
Basic explanation of words
樔
cháo
The tall shack in Zezhong.
In ancient times, the "nest" is a bird's nest; it also refers to the dwelling place of people when there is no house: "Yao does not punish Xu Yu, and the people of Tang dynasty are not everywhere."
樔
jiǎo
Gu Tong "suppresses" and destroys.
樔
chāo
A small net for fishing.
樔
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cháo］
["Guangyun" cross-cutting, flat delicacy, chong. ]
Bird's nest. It also refers to the simple dwellings built by ancient humans on trees.
[②]［zhāo］
["Ji Yun" Zhuang cross-cut, flat line, Zhuang. ]
Linked with "罺1".
Fishnet.
[③] [jiǎo]
["Hongwu Zhengyun" Zi Xiaoqie, Shang Xiao]
Pass "Suppress 1".
樔
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　樔; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 550 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Cross cutting, sound nest. [Said the text] Zezhong Shou Cao Lou also. Also made a nest. 【Li·Liyun·Liaochao Note】樔, also made a nest. [Cao Dafa·Dongzheng Fu] Forgive me if you don’t climb up and lie down. [Zheng Yun] Make a mistake.　[Classes] Side-to-side intersection. Same as 罺.橑罟 also. 【Erya·Release Device】Guang is called the Shan. [Poem·Xiaoya] Suiran Shanshan. [Mao Chuan] Ye Ye. [Li Xunyun] Take the thin fish.　 [Zheng Yun] cut again, and the sound is suppressed. 【Emperor Wu of the Han Dynasty·Mourning Madame Li Fu】The fate is not long.　【Zhengzitong】The nest should be from the mortar and from the wood. Vulgar follow the fruit, not.

樔
Name meaning
Nothing.
cháo, [c][i]в, coчeт., тakжe[/i][/c], zǎo
сущ.
1) караульная вышка на воде; шалаш на воде
登樔 подняться на сторожевую вышку
2) вм. 罺 (верша)
3) вм. 巢 (гнездо)
